description: This Java class defines a REST controller for managing drivers within a taxi booking backend application. It provides endpoints for creating, retrieving, listing, and updating the availability of driver entities.

classes.name: DriverController
classes.description: REST controller providing endpoints for creating, retrieving, listing, and updating driver entities.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new driver based on the provided request data and returns the created driver data with HTTP status 201.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a driver by their unique ID.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of all drivers.

methods.name: listAvailable
methods.description: Returns a list of all available drivers with status AVAILABLE.

methods.name: updateAvailability
methods.description: Updates the availability status of a driver identified by ID.
